line.en: We return to the dormitory as soon as possible.
First we need to contact everyone.
'Kotori? Sorry, we just got a call from the\nAstronomy Club and...'
'Asa, did you see the mail? The Astronomy\nClub...'
After we had contacted everyone, Ageha and I keep\nquiet in the silent dormitory.
Has it finally... come?
'I wonder if it really will... happen?'
'It still looks like the chances it will are\npretty high.'
'I wonder if everything will go according to\nplan?'
'They'll go better than planned.'
'If we just had 3 more days. We could have tested\nwhether it was possible to go above 2000 meters.'
'Well there's nothing we can do about it now. For\nnow I'm going to go back home and make\npreparations to stay here.'
'...Before that can I use the shower?'
'OK.'
'You want to join me?'
'By all means.'
'Someone can contact us anytime, so no more sex.'
'I wonder how long I can last...'
'Beee, perverted Aoi.'
Ageha made a cute grimace and disappeared into\nthe bathroom.
My thoughts naturally returned to the things we\ndid, but suddenly I started to feel a peculiar\nsensation.
No way... the Morning Glory?
My precious dream.
To cross that airspace.
For this I've been working really hard the whole\nyear.
But for this moment to actually come...
'Damn...'
My body was trembling.
Was it excitement, or was it fear from flying an\naircraft that I still wasn't familiar enough\nwith?
Two hours later, all members gathered at the\ndorm.
Kotori, who came back from her family as soon as\npossible.
Kazato twins did the same, shortening the time\nthey were going to spend with their grandfather.
Ageha also visited her family, but came back\nright away with her luggage.
'Me too.'
Mmm... well I guess that's OK.
The number of people has increased, but in the\nend it's the same people who camped out here\ntogether last year.
'Did you hear? It's going to come?'
She says, turning up, without even saying hello,\nvery much like her.

'Just going from the weather report it looks
likely and according to the Astronomy Club, the
predicted events will occur tomorrow, and then
after that, it really will happen.'
Ageha holds up raw data that she has apparently\nreceived from the Astronomy Club.
Amane and Yoru scrutinize the data.
'...It really is coming, isn't it... that,\nbeautiful sky bridge.'
'It's coming. Finally.'
'Right. This is the time.'
The dormitory is empty, so everyone makes\npreparations to stay.
Last year the day and time we would stay over was\ndecided beforehand, but this time was so last\nminute it caused quite a commotion.
Dinner and breakfast preparations, allotting\nshifts to check sky conditions, contingency plans\nshould anything go wrong, we have a lot to do.
And... when it comes to this sort of thing, Ageha\nis the one we depend on.
'Hotaru and Asa, you will be on dinner duties!'
'Roger!'
'Yoru, you will be checking weather maps and sky\nconditions! Amane, do whatever you can!'
'Huh? That's... even if you say that...'
Ageha understands. In this situation there isn't\nmuch for Amane to do.
'OK, well, based on weather forecast I will\nadjust the flight plan...'
'Aoi, Kotori, you two go to bed.'
'Hey, wait. Let me do something as well.'
'For now your job is to sleep.'
'Get a good sleep and wake up before the sun\nrises. Then eat breakfast, stretch and make sure\nyou're in tip-top shape for flying.'
'But everyone else is working so hard...'
'No, resting is the best thing we can do.'
'Do you want to fly in the Morning Glory having\nbarely slept and being all numb? That would be\nunwise. You understand that, right?'
'From now we will sleep and then, over two days,\nget our bodies to peak condition. Time it to when\nwe think the Morning Glory will come.'
'I've learned this from my experience in\ncompetitions so I'm used to this.'
'Really...?'
I make Kotori prepare for bed as she reluctantly\nconcedes.
As I push the wheelchair, Kotori turns around and\nlooks apologetically at everyone busily working\nin the food hall.
'OK then... goodnight.'
'Goodnight, Aoi.'
'Ah my job is up. I will sleep with Aoi.'
'You come over here!'
As Hotaru tries to follow after me, Ageha grabs\nher by the collar and pulls her back.
'Ouch!'
Plucked up like a child, that's Hotaru.
'I wonder if we can sleep.'
'It's not happening tomorrow morning so if we\nwake up really early tomorrow, we'll go straight\nto sleep afterwards.'
'Yeah you're right... thanks, I'll do my best.'
'I'm going to dream of the Morning Glory. Flying\nthrough that perfect passage of clouds. Make it a\ndream that comes true.'
'Yeah... I will. Good night.'
I also make preparations to sleep then leave the\nroom.
'It's been a year since... then.'
So much has happened.
Last year, when, as now, we were waiting like\nthis, I never would have thought that these\nthings would happen.

The garage was destroyed, the glider, having lost
its home, was hidden in the dorm... for one year,
the group remained resigned to the fact. Then Asa
and Yoru became part of the club.
And then, that we would be able to fly the\nmachine which we rebuilt.
If you were to show the current me to the old me,\nthe one who one year before last was riding\nbicycles, he probably wouldn't believe his eyes.

I never imagined I would have an accident or that
the accident would hurt my leg so much that I
couldn't compete anymore... but because of that,
I found gliders and made new friends.
The best... friends I love, I even got a\ngirlfriend...!
...But.
She still hasn't told me that she feels the same\nway... so despite myself I can't help but have a\nshadow over my heart.
'...Alright, It's decided!'
If the Morning Glory really does happen ...and if\nI can pass through their unscathed.
I will have her say it.
If I fail, she doesn't have to say a thing.
This is what I will tell Ageha.
If our long held dream of this past year comes\ntrue, then my other dream should come true,\nright?
I'm allowed to hope for that much aren't I, God\nof the Skies?
I'm awoken by my alarm while it's still dark.
'Whaaa...'
As I expected, I'm incredibly sleepy.
But I don't feel like I'm lacking in sleep.
It's fine, if I had to fly straight from now\nthere would be no problem.
It seems that everyone else is sleeping, the dorm\nis so quiet.
And then I hear the sound of a wheelchair.
'Yah.'
'Oh, you're awake too?'
'Yeah... I couldn't sleep very well.'
'I'm feeling good so leave it to me.'
'Thanks, I'll be counting on you.'
'...Kotori, you've grown up haven't you? You\nnever used to be the person to say something like\nthat.'
'Acting all high and mighty are we?'
'Though, now that you mention it, Aoi you weren't\nthis kind of guy before either.'
'What kind of guy?'
'A skirt chaser.'
'In what way?'
'Hotaru, Asa, even Akari, there were rumors\nabout'
'Ah, that...'
So much has happened, it feels like ancient\nhistory now. Though it hasn't been a month yet.
'Ha?! For all I know you want to add me to your\nlist of accomplishments!'
'No way, that will never happen.'
'Should I take that as an insult? Or should I\nconsider myself lucky?'
'Aoi's number one girl has arrived!'
'Hey!'
I'm grabbed from behind.
Is it just me or has Hotaru's espionage skills\nimproved?
'My turn on look out has finished. So I'm heading\nto bed.'
'Ah ok. Rest well.'
'I'll be borrowing your bed, Aoi.'
'You guys sure do get along.'
'Hey, wait a minute.'
'Could you stop fooling around and come over\nhere.'
'Yoru.'
She was positioned at a table with a computer in\nfront of her.
'Good morning.'
'Thanks for all your hard work.'
'It's no problem I'll get straight to the point,\nat the moment there haven't been any warning\nsigns.'
'Ah OK... What's that screen?'
Some kind of program is running on the notebook\ncomputer, but the screen is completely black.
'It's a live feed. The glider area, the roof of\nthe secret base and so on. Here and there, I've\nplaced weather sensors.'
'You did all that?'
'Yeah. I did it yesterday with Ageha and\nTatsuya.'
'Ah, yeah I thought you guys were up to\nsomething. So it was this.'
'I helped too.'
I should've known. She really is something.
'So... it's not coming'
'There are strong winds, low temperatures,\ndefinitely what the data predicts. It's very\nsimilar conditions to that of 27 years ago.'
'So, today we'll do altitude tests?'
'Well... the winds are looking to become stronger\na low pressure system is approaching, and it may\nrain in the afternoon.'
'Ah jeez...'
'Anyways, Hotaru go sleep. I will take my turn in\nabout two hours.'
'Thanks. You keep it up for just a little\nlonger.'
For my part, I prepare breakfast so that everyone\ncan eat it whenever they wake up.
A little after that it starts to brighten outside\nbut...
As Yoru said, the sky hangs heavy with clouds and\na fairly strong wind is blowing.
'At the moment nothing is happening, huh?'
'I wonder if it's OK if I go back to bed. Yawn'
'That won't do. Stay awake until sunset.'
'Mmm... I guess I have no choice.'
'Morning.'
'Hey.'
'Ah, so it didn't happen yet. That's good.'
'That's a good thing?'
'Of course. I mean, we've still got so much\npreparations to do. If it came now we wouldn't be\nready in time.'
'From now I'm going to head out and have my last\nmeetings.'
'Ah... Ageha.'
'Hmm? What's up?'
Because Kotori is next to us I can't say it.
'When you get back... there's something I want to\nask you, OK?'
'Ah, sure.'
'Anyway, I'll see you later. I'm off!'
'Sure...'
I wave with a feeling of disappointment and watch\nAgeha leave.
And then... the afternoon.
I watch as the glider is taken out of the secret\nbase and carried to the runway.
'The wind's picked up, hasn't it?'
'There's thick clouds, looks like it'll rain.'
'Last year the sky was pretty rough ... similar\nto these conditions. I want to fly though.'
'Yeah, me too.'
If it was that flying area I always go to, the\ninstructor would decide whether or not the flight\nwould be cancelled.
But now there is only us... What should we do?
'OK! Everyone. Well finish things up here for\ntoday!'
'Did something happen?'
'The rain clouds are almost upon us Pretty strong\nones, coming from over the ocean.'
'Ah well I guess we have to then.'
If the Morning Glory does come tomorrow it's\nunfortunate that this would have to be the eve of\nthe event.
For things to develop like this, I can't describe\nhow much it puts a damper on things.
After we return to the secret base rain drops\nbegin to fall.
'That was close.'
'Yeah totally.'
Not being able to fly, I can't help but feel a\nlittle uneasy.
'Do you want to use the simulator?'
'I guess that's all we can do...'
Our mood before the real thing couldn't be worse.
But, right at that moment.
'Yes! It's come! It's come!'
Ageha, comes running in dripping wet.
Wet... no-no, I shouldn't be remembering our\nfirst time now.
'Alright, you brought it back inside. That's\ngood, if it was left outside that would've been a\nbig problem.'
'The glider?'
'Yeah. Everyone, could you help?'
Ageha pulls out an ultra small camera from her\nbag.
'A present from the Broadcasting Club. There's 8\nin total. They won't cause any harm to your\nflying. Think of good places to attach them.'
'You want to do a live broadcast, do you?.'
'Of course. An event like this. We can't let it\ngo to waste. When I proposed the idea, those guys\nwere all for it.'

'And these are the sensors provided by the
Astronomy Club. They're going to measure the
atmosphere conditions at the time the Morning
Glory occurs.'
'I guess you traded old weather data for those?'
'Exactly. Give and take my friend. We get these.\nThey get the data.'
'These are experimental devices from the Physics\nClub. And we've had various requests from the\nBiology Club.'
'Wow, that much...?'
'Space station experiments get requests years in\nadvance. Compared to that this is nothing.'
'Is this what you told them?...'
'Yup. We get to use various machines. And\neveryone is making accommodations for us.'
'Because you're here you probably don't know, but\neveryone in the school is paying attention to\nthis.'
'It's the summer vacation but it feels like it's\nthe night before the school festival.'
'To watch the flight from the rooftop. People are\nalready trying to stay over at the school.'
'...Is that gonna be OK? What if the school finds\nout...'
Especially Tobioka.
We fooled him during the summer vacation and we\ndidn't have any trouble with him since then so I\nfelt at ease but...
Isn't that kind of commotion a little dangerous?
'Mmm, yeah there is that... but it's officially\nclub activities so, Tobioka has no reason to get\ninvolved, right?'
'So it's fine I think.'
...At that moment I was probably the only person\nwho saw the wild look in Ageha's eyes.
If Tobioka tries to get in the way, I don't know\nwhat, but she will do something about it.
'Hey! Hey! We've got a lot of work to do!\nEveryone get moving!'
At her prompting we all hustle towards the\nglider.
'There's that many people watching us.'
'Yeah... It's crazy I'm starting to get a bit\nexcited.'
'Actually, me too.'
A shiver runs through me.
Kotori is the same.
Trembling with excitement... wait, not\nexcitement.
'Is it just me... or is it a bit cold?'
'The AC?'
'Ah! There's a reading on the sensors! The\ntemperature outside is steadily decreasing!'
Yoru runs to the computer connected to the\noutside observation cameras.

'The rain is lightening up. The rain clouds are
passing and breaks in the clouds are appearing.
But the wind is still strong, there's high
humidity and the temperature is decreasing.'
We all look at each other.
The three precursor's to the Morning Glory that\nwe researched last year.
1: The day before there will be humid, strong\nwinds, humidity high enough to put water drops\ninside a pub refrigerator.
2: At twilight on the day before, the eastern sky\nwill turn purple.
3: It will become so cold that you can't believe\nit's still Summer.
'Hold on... Is this real?...'
'It's going to happen...?'
This time I shake with excitement for real.
'Oh my God! Look outside! Look!'
'Wow!'
The rain has stopped, it's humid, a chilling wind\ncontinues to blow.
We open our eyes wide.
The eastern sky has turned a bluish, purple\ncolor.
The western sky, where the sun is setting, is its\nusual orange color, without question the sun is\nthere.
But the eastern sky is also lit, as if it were\nnear dawn, a faint color resides within.
'This... is...?'
It's completely different from last year. An\noverwhelming feeling that this is the real thing.
'Yeah.'
'It's coming... the Morning Glory is really\ncoming!'
What we've been waiting for, what we've dreamed\nabout, the passage of clouds will appear!
'Yes! We're gonna do it!'
And suddenly the gloom that had been hanging over\nus is replaced by elation.
'The dinner patrol is about to head out!'
'I'm heading out darling.'
'I know you don't mean me.'
To prepare for the evening, Asa and Hotaru go out\nshopping.
'The predicted wind direction will be like\nthis... so you want to take off like this. Rotate\nhere and set an altitude...'
'I see... but last year, finding the thermal was\napparently difficult, is there something...'
For my part I'm getting fired up about the flight\nplan.
'Alright!'
Shouting out the same way I did, Ageha hits her\npalm with her fist.
'OK then, I'm gonna head out for a bit again.'
'Because we've confirmed it's going to happen, I\nhave to make one final request.'
'What are you? A presidential candidate?'
'I'm counting on you guys to handle the\nconstruction.'
'Right.'
I take a quick look at everyone behind me.
The coast is clear... you can do it.
'Hey, Ageha. I have one thing I need to ask you.'
'Ah you said that this morning, right? What's\nup?'
Like when I confessed to her before I take a deep\nbreath.
'I'm going to fly so...'
'If I return in one piece I'd like you to say\nthose words to me.'
Ageha takes on a serious expression and looks\nstraight at me.
'Waiting for one year, preparing for one year, my\ndream to fly. All of that, I'll dedicate to\nhearing you say those words.'
'Isn't that enough? Even if I go that far you\nwon't say it?'
'That's...'
Ageha's eyes begin to shake, she averts her gaze\ntimidly.
And then, in a voice almost crying.
'...Alright...OK...'
She whispers.
'Yes!'
My motivation soars.
More that ever, to its highest point.
'Alright then, I'm going to fly. No question, I'm\nflying.'
'Me too I'll... I'll make you fly...'
She says turning red.
'Ok, I'm going to go.'
As if running away, Ageha goes out.
While watching her walk away, I softly make a\nfits and assume a pose of triumph.
Alright, all that's left is to fly.
...But.
After that, unexpected obstacles come from\nunforeseen angles which endanger tomorrow's\nflight.
The first obstacle.
'As your supervisor, I can't approve of\ntomorrow's flight.'
Amane says out of the blue.
The shopping group returns, it's dinner time.
Ageha hasn't returned yet, but she sends an\ne-mail saying to start without her so we cook and\nstart eating.

After we finish we'll take the glider to the
runway, after which we'll take turns sleeping,
keeping watch over the glider and checking the
sky's condition, then wait until dawn and then
take off!
Right when we are discussing this plan and\ngetting all excited.
'Munch, munch, gulp, gulp'
As usual the Kazato sisters do their beauty an\ninjustice by eating like pigs.
'Amane, you have something to say?'
Kotori turns around, stops her mouth which looked\nlike it would bite into the plate itself and\nlooks absent mindedly.
'Hmm... I think it would be better if you didn't\nfly...'
Of course the room goes dead silent.
'Why are you saying something like that?'
'Nah... It's just dangerous... you know.'
Amane says timidly, but clearly while licking\nfried chicken off her fingers.
'Dangerous?!'
'Strong winds, turbulence and high pressure. We\nstill don't know yet, whether we can fly in these\nconditions or not.'
'Wait! We designed the glider with those\nconditions in mind, right?! So why are you saying\nthis now?'
'Hold on Kotori... calm down, let's hear what she\nhas to say.'
I restrain Kotori while I myself am breaking into\na cold sweat.
'As we all know I flew last year.'
'But still... when I watch what you guys are\ndoing from the outside It seems dangerous, risky,\nscary...'
Amane says, honestly shaking.
'So that's... you want to run away from your\nresponsibility?'
'No, it's not that... um... like... how can I put\nthis?'
'Flying in the sky is an amazing thing.'
'But it isn't something you should gamble your\nlife with. In the end it's just a club activity.'
Yoru can't think of a reply and falls silent.
Asa also tries to protest, but she can't find the\nright words and becomes quiet.
'But... I want to fly!'
Kotori bursts out irrationally.
'It's what we've worked so hard to accomplish\nthis past year.'
'We've been waiting and waiting all year. It's\nfinally going to happen tomorrow.'
'I'm sure you understand our feelings Amane.'
'Yeah... more than you know.'
'But still I am your supervisor, and your teacher\nI can't put you guys in danger.'
'I don't want to lose anyone else.'
'Mmm.'
Kotori glares at Amane who scratches her cheek\nawkwardly.
'What? If you wait another 30 years there'll be\nanother chance. Can't we just back out of this\none.'
'Are you crazy?!'
Ah, she's lost it.
'As if we can wait that long! It's now or never!'
'...Right, now or never.'
I slowly open my mouth.
Until now I was sorting out my thoughts.
No... that's not it, I wasn't thinking.
I was sorting out my feelings... and steeling on\nmy resolve.
'I'm sorry Amane.'
'No matter what happens we are going to fly.'
'Even you, Aoi? Oh brother.'
'The one who taught us about gliders The one who\nshowed us the dream of the Morning Glory. That\nwas you.'
'I want you to take responsibility for that.'
'That's pretty hard to hear.'
'So if the Morning Glory occurs, no matter what\nhappens, we will fly.'
'That's right! We're going to fly!'
'Oh brother... Are you guys the same?'
'Yes!'
'We understand what you're saying but for us to\ngo against our destiny at this point would be a\ncrime.'
'Oh jeez'
'I am prepared for the risk of being injured or\nworse.'
'No matter how often we say that it's fine, it\nwon't make any difference.'
'I don't want to cause any trouble for you. So if\nyou decide that it's impossible I'll turn back.'
'Really? Even if your goal is right there in\nfront of you?'
'Even if the Morning Glory is in front of my\neyes. Even if I'm 100 meters in the air. If you\ngive the word, I will turn back.'
'Seriously? That's a promise. If you break it I\nwill be seriously angry. I will kill you until\nyou die.'
'OK, I will be killed until I die, that's fine'
...Right, I'm probably walking the same path\nAmane walked last year.
Just as long as I can fly in Morning Glory.
After that all that's left...
Flying by itself is of course amazing.
But if I'm able to fly tomorrow, will I be able\nto let go of my emotions and turn back if it's\ndangerous, like Amane?
In fact, I understand what that means, that\ntomorrow, no, today I will fly.
I will fly with these feelings that I could only\nhave at this moment.
'Oh brother...you guys...'
'I envy you.'
'As a teacher I can't tell you to do something\ndangerous. Please understand that.'
'But if you are all going to act as one group.\nThen there's no way that I can stop you is\nthere?'
'Yes!'
'Alright!'
Yay, say the Kazato sisters with a clap.
Great, this way all obstacles have been cleared.
... Then, as we are all in high spirits.
A second obstacle appears.
Or perhaps it'd be better to say... a bomb was\ndropped on us.
'Huh?'
Kotori answers her cell phone and takes on a\nstrange expression.
'Yes, this is Habane... Yes... Yes but...'
She heads to the dock and starts talking.
From her way of speaking she clearly isn't\ntalking to someone she's close to.
It's definitely not Hibari, family or Ageha... so\nwho is it?
She suddenly raises her voice so we all get a\nstart.
'Wait a minute! That's! That's just..!'
As Kotori talks she walks back towards us and,\nmotioning with her hands, requests something to\nwrite with.
As soon as a memo pad and pen is passed to her\nshe begins scribbling.
A person's name.
Um... who is this?...
I tilt my heard as Kotori keeps writing.
'Runway.
...Runway?
Ah! I remember, it's the name of the owner of the\nland the runway is on.
Mowing lawns, fixing winches, a person who does\nthat kind of work. I have met him a few times.
Just the other day, when returning from the\nassociation, Kotori and Amane went to say hello.
'No, but, we had a deal but... but!'
'No it's not like that. It's perfectly safe.\nThere's a supervising teacher involved.'
'...That's... but... Hey! Please! Let us use it!'
We all lose color.
The person who owns the runway is refusing\npermission.
Kotori, turning pale, scribbles with her pen.
'Tobioka?
Tobioka?!
Tobioka has come here and got involved?!
'OK... goodbye...'
After she hangs up Kotori is completely pale.
'What happened?!'
'We've been foiled.'
'It seems there was a phone call a little while\nago... from Tobioka...'

'The members of the Soaring Club, in an act of
youthful indiscretion, in the middle of this
terrible weather, are hoping to attempt an
incredibly dangerous flight".'
'I, as a teacher, have a responsibility to stop\nthis".'
'If there was an accident, you, as the person who\nowns the land, would also be liable".'
'So, to ensure they don't try anything rash\ntonight. He said he was told to make it so the\nwinch is unusable.'
'What the hell is that?'

'If the weather was good he would let us use it
like usual but with dangerous weather like this,
he would prefer we refrained. He was saying
exactly what Tobioka wants.'
'Oh man...'
'This is terrible...'
'We've been foiled.'
'He was keeping quiet. Waiting for this very\nmoment...'
'Damn it!'
We can overcome Amane's resistance with our\nwillpower.
But if we can't use the winch...!
Physically there is nothing we can do.
If we can't use the winch to tow the glider\nstrongly and quickly it can't take off.
'Is there... anything... we can do...?'
'Mmm... even if you look at me like that'
'Yoru, if we put a wire over that large windmill\ncould we use that to lift it up and take off?'
'What like with a big lasso?'
'If you want to be pulled you would have to wait\nfor the blade to be at it's highest point before\nlatching on.'
'How would you throw a wire that high?'
'Ahhhh... umm..!'
'It wasn't a bad idea, OK.'
'So there's... nothing... we can do..?'
This can't be the end.
Not like this.
We've come this far. We've worked so hard.
It can't end like this!
I put all my final hopes on Ageha and call her.
...She returns after a while.
It seems as if she hurried because despite the\ncold she is panting and sweating.
'Huff, huff... looks like we have a problem,\ndoesn't it?'
'On my way back I went to check on the runway.\nIt's definite, we can't use the winch.'
'The control panel isn't just locked. The parts\nhave been removed. Even if we broke the lock, we\ncouldn't use it.'
'That was probably also Tobioka's idea.'
'Sorry, this is probably my fault. In order to\nraise support I talked to people all over.'
'Yeah, but I also told the Hibari sisters. Even\nat school it was said that the Soaring Club is\nmaking moves.'
'We also told our grandfather. There's no\nguarantee that he didn't tell anyone.'
'I don't think grandpa would say anything that\nwould hurt us though.'
No, but even if they don't mean to, if an ill\nwilled person wants to obtain that information,\nthey'll get it out of them.
'Even me, I can't guarantee that I didn't let it\nslip somewhere.'
'Let's not worry about who's fault it is. Anyone\ncould be at fault, or none of us.'
'That's right. It's unproductive. Instead of that\nlet's think of what we're going to do.'
But... even if you say that, without the winch\nwe're at an impasse .
'Isn't there any way?'
'...I'm sorry, but at the moment... there's\nnothing...'
Even Ageha can't think of anything...
So, this really is... the end...?
Finished.
My dream, everyone's dream, our goal, our\nefforts, everything was pointless, meaningless, a\nfailure.
'Sniff... sniff...'
Kotori begins to cry.
As if prompted by this, Asa and Yoru start\ncrying, too. Their eyes turn red and their noses\nrun.
I also have to use all my strength not to fall to\nmy knees.
'Aoi... don't cry.'
'Like I would cry... over this... damn it...!'
And so.. right on the verge of completion our\nadventure is over...
I can hear Tobioka's high pitched laughter.
What was that sound?
'Ah.. I got a message.'
As Ageha's eyes look at the display her eyes\nlight up.
'OK!'
'What?'
'I'm going to go out for a bit!'
'Huh? Wait? Hey!'
She disappears without giving me a chance to ask\nwhat the mail was.
'What... What happened?'
'She... like...'
When I asked if there wasn't anything we could\ndo,
She said 'there's nothing... for the moment'.
For the moment.
So... later there will be... she'll find\nsomething.
So the E-mail she just got, what was that?
'Ah! '
An E-mail from Ageha.
Sorry, I forgot to tell you to prepare for\ntomorrow, get some rest If you can't, I'm sorry.
'Prepare for tomorrow?... If you can't...?'
There's no doubt about it.
She plans on doing something.
'What?'
'Alright! Time to sleep!'
Ageha's will to protect the secret base, our\nplace, the Soaring Club.
I'm going to put my faith in that.
'...Easier said than done.'
That was, as expected, the only problem.
...As predicted, even after lying down, it seems\neveryone wasn't able to ease their anxieties\nenough to really sleep.
I was the only one who slept soundly.
'You... you're quite something hey...'
'I've just bet everything on Ageha that's all.'
'Even if I was to lose my cool, the situation\nwouldn't change, right?'
'That's what makes you quite something. Either\nthat or you're just totally dumb.'
'So... what's up?'
'I think the time has come.'
It's a bit before dawn.
I take a look outside.
'...Whooooaaa!'
W...Wow!
The eastern sky is beginning to light up as dawn\nis approaching.
The wind, which didn't change since yesterday, is\nas strong as ever.
In the sky...
...There is a thin line of clouds that are\ncatching the first sun rays.
Thin... and long.
Unusually long.
Stretching above our heads, to the limit of our\neyesight, towards the direction of the lake.
'That's it! It's come!'
'There's no doubt about it.'
'That's... the Morning Glory!'
'Amazing!...'
'Ah, it's Ageha!'
'Are you awake?!'
'Yeah, I just woke up, I'm looking at the sky.'
'In that case we don't need to say much, get\nready.'
'To fly? Are we going to be able to fly?'
'Yes!'
...She yells so loud it feels like it travels\nthrough my head to the opposite ear.
Ageha returns riding on a bicycle. Hands free at\nthat.
'Everyone listen up! We can fly!'
'Whaaaaa.'
'Seriously? We can seriously fly?!'
'Yes!'
'Um... I'll quickly explain.'
Ageha stands in front of the whiteboard.
'Because we've lent a club room to the Touring\nClub, they've been nice enough to lend us a\nhand.'
She draws two rectangles on the board

'I don't dare to say where they came from, but
we've got two 'zero-four' cars With two drivers..
we will have them tow the glider Then we will
fly.'
'So that was it!'
'Zero four?'
'It's a car race that begins from a standing\nstart and spans 400 meters. Like a 100 meter\nsprint in Track and Field, in a car version.'
'To compete they use modified cars which have\namazing acceleration.'
'They're not made for pulling though? We'd have\nto make modifications. Are the owners OK with\nthat?'
'The person who managed to clear that with the\nTouring Club is in your favour!'
I want to ask her exactly how she managed to do\nthis... I'll leave that until after.
'I went to school to confirm that this would be\npossible.'
'And through my calculations I have come to the\nconclusion. That we can fly just as high as with\nusing the winch.'
'Is there actually a way we can use cars to tow\nand take off?'
'It's the only option we have left.'
...Overwhelmed, everyone stays silent for a\nwhile.
'You guys will have to perform without a trial\nrun, but Aoi, Kotori, we're counting on you.'
'Leave it to me!'
'I'm on it!'
We almost say it at the same time.
'Um... it I think it will be dangerous...'
Amane, as expected, says the same thing as\nyesterday.
'As our supervisor it's normal that you would say\nthat.'
'But, sorry... if this is the only way I will\ngladly take this option.'
'Even if I tried... I couldn't stop you, could\nI?'
'No.'
We nod our heads and Amane, smiling bitterly,\nwithdraws.
'Alright! Let's get ready! Quickly people!'
Everyone begins moving all together ...I look\nback at Ageha.
'...Ageha.'
'Yes.'
'Thank you.'
'I'll fly.'
'I know.'
'I'm going to fly so... I'm going up there.'
'If I return... when I return...'
As if she might break out crying any second she\nnods her head.
'Hey, over here!'
Two cars, clearly different from normal cars,\napproach.
'Yo, Ageha.'
'Glad you came! This is the wire, quickly attach\nit.'
'Hurry!'
In the sky, the Morning Glory gradually changes\nshape, reaching it's true form.
It will only show itself for a brief time.
I have to fly before that happens.
...The first to notice is Kotori.
A car separate from the Touring Club's.
Approaches at a rapid pace... and takes up a\nposition blocking the road.
To... Tobioka!
'You people... I had to see it to believe it.'
'I'm sorry, sir.'
'The sky is amazing, isn't it? We're going to go\nup there.'
'No you aren't! I can't allow you to do that!'
'I'm fully aware you haven't properly tested that\nglider.'
'You want to fly that thing in these fierce\nwinds? I won't allow it.'
'I can't allow students in my school to cause\nanother accident.'
'But sir! I want to fly!'
'There are many other ways to express yourself.'
'You can't make our decisions for us.'
I stop Kotori who looks as if she will plow into\nTobioka with her wheelchair.
'I understand that you're worried about us.'
'That you would come out at this time to stop us.\nYou really are that worried about us, aren't\nyou?'
'It definitely is a dangerous undertaking. If an\naccident happens we can't take it back.'
'So what ,you're not mistaken in what you say.'
'Precisely!'
'But!'
I raise my voice.
'We are mistaken. We are taking actions which are\nprobably a mistake.'
'But we are still going to fly!'
'Even if it means going against our teachers,\nreceiving punishment, getting expelled, I am\nprepared to face any consequences.'
I point towards the sky.
'This is a once in a lifetime opportunity, to fly\nin this sky.'
'If I have to be expelled and become a\ndelinquent, I am fine with that.'
'So, If you don't mind, I will be forcing my way\nthrough.'
'That's right! We're going to go!'
'Mochizuki say something!'
'I can't, I'm only a new teacher, and a\nreplacement teacher at that.'
'If a veteran like you can't stop them, there's\nno chance I could.'
I can't believe it, Amane took such a sly way\nout.
'Grrrr.'
'If that's the case let me say something.'
Tobioka breaks into a defiant smile.
'Oh no, my car keys have disappeared I'll have to\ncall for help to move my car but it will take\ntime.'
Tobioka's car is still in a position that blocks\nthe road.
There is only one road up the hill leading to the\nsecret base.
As things are there is no way we can move the\nglider to the other bank!
'What should we do Ageha?'
'Can you move that car aside?'
'If you touch that car I will call the police.'
'If the police come... that would be a huge\nproblem.'
'Also, the runway. If you use it without\npermission from the owner, I'll call the police\nfor trespassing.'
'The owner requested I do this if my students\nattempted to force their way in.'
'How low are you willing to go?'
'Please sir, please.'
'We don't have any more time.'
In the sky, the Morning Glory has almost\ncompletely taken shape.
In the Eastern Sky the sun has also showed\nitself.

From now we have to take the glider to the
opposite runway, put it together, maybe deal with
the owner's protests... if I think about it, if
we don't move now we won't make it.
'That's...'
'Ageha, over there... why don't we go there?!'
I don't point to the runway on the opposite shore\nof the Lake, I point in a different direction.
'I often thought we could use that place when I\nwas riding past on my bike.'
'Over there?'
'But... you're right...'
'It's worth a shot.'
The bridge that crosses the lake.
Because it's in the opposite direction of\nTobioka's car we'll be able to move.
It's only a little distance from the runway.
'OK! We'll go there!'
Ageha starts contacting people on her cell phone.
We all turn our attention to the glider now in\nthe back of a trailer.
'Hey! Hey! What are you thinking?! Stop! I said\nstop!'
We ignore Tobioka and keep working.
Finally Tobioka's anger reaches its peak and he\njumps at us.
'Whoa, whoa.'
A hand comes from behind to stop him.
'An-chan!'
'Igarashi?!'
'Long time no see, Tobioka-sensei.'
Igarashi, himself an Old Boy from Keifuu, gently\nstops Tobioka and walks in front of him.

'Igarashi, they're trying to take off from a
place that isn't even a runway. They want to fly
from there! It's too dangerous! They have to
stop!'
'...Is this true?'
'Yes. We don't have time to explain.'
'Like sensei says, it's very dangerous.'
'I understand that but...'
I look right into An-chan's eyes.
'...Got it.'
'To be honest I want to stop you too. Because\nyou're not completely prepared.'
'But you guys have come this far. I find it hard\nto think that you would fail now.'
'An-chan.'
He grabs my shoulders tightly.
'It's an older brother's duty to push you in the\nback sometimes.'
'This is a once in a lifetime chance. Give it\neverything you've got and fly!'
He shakes off Tobioka and walks over to us.
According to Ageha, she contacted the Touring\nClub and had the entrance to the opposite side of\nthe lake blocked off.
So we won't have to worry about cars coming from\nthe opposite direction... be that as it may.
It definitely looks like we'll be able to fly.
But the road isn't smooth and it's not a straight\npath... I wonder if it will actually take off?
'This is...'
Everyone finds it difficult to hide their unease.
'Is it really... OK?'
'I'm scared...'
I'm struck with a lack of confidence in my own\nidea.
If we can't fly like this..?
'Go fly, Aoi!'
'Ageha?'
'This is what we worked so hard for, right?'
'The glider is perfect because we made it\ntogether.'
'No accident will happen. You and Kotori are\ngoing to fly.'
'It's the fruit of all the efforts the Soaring\nClub have made this year. Have confidence!'
'All preparations are complete. Fly, as if your\nheart had wings.'
'So go and fly! That's an order!'
For a moment everyone stares blankly.
'Hey what's with all the melodrama?'
As usual Kotori starts up.
To which Ageha says.
'Well, Aoi's mine, so...'
Then she grabs me by the neck.
'Smooch'
'Hmph'
Forcefully, our lips touch. Or should I say she\nforces her lips on mine.
Without thinking my back straightens, my hands go\nstiff and I claw at the air.
'Ah... ah!'
'Mmmwah!'
With a look of satisfaction Ageha removes her\nlips.
My brain goes completely blank.
Ageha looks around at everyone full of\nconfidence.
'Does anyone have a problem with this?'
Everyone shakes their head.
'OK then! My Aoi! Go!'
'Hurry, go fly and return in one piece.'
'If you return in one piece I'll give you another\none.'
'Got it... I'll definitely come back. In one\npiece.'
'Good.'
'Ageha.'
'Aoi.'
'Cough. You're forgetting about me aren't you?'
'Ah jeez, you guys make me sick.'
'I guess... this is what couples are like.'
'No, no this is a bad example. Please don't look\nout to them.'
'Huff... Good for you Ageha...'
'OK! Kotori, let's go!'
When I try to place Kotori in the passenger seat\nshe turns away.
'Excuse me, Igarashi-san, could you help me get\nin?'
'Because if I let Aoi touch other girls it's\nunfair on Ageha.'
'Hey wait a minute.'
Ah well, preparations are completed.
The canopy is closed, Asa and Ageha raise the\nright and left wings.
'Wind speed, wind direction, no problems.'
'Looks like we're going to do it'
'You guys ready?!'
'Yes! OK!'
'The runway is clear!'
'OK, then let's go... Take off in T minus 10'
In front of us the modified cars' engines begin\nto roar.
Alright... let's go!
'Go my darling Aoi. You too Kotori!'
'What do you mean 'you too'?'
With a clunk the machine begins to move.
'Ageha, if I come back you have to say those\nwords!'
'Well you have to return first. Now. Go!'
As the glider begins to move, she releases her\nhands as if giving the machine a push.
And then she cups her mouth with both hands and\nyells something.
She isn't near the intercom so I can't hear what\nshe's saying.
The glider suddenly starts accelerating ... I\npull the joystick, feel that old sensation of\nG-force, then we rise.
'Take off!!!'
It's different to a winch so the timing at which\nto cut the wire is...
'Cut the towing cord!'
Alright, success!
The towing power is removed and now the machine\nis only using the wind to go up.
Above the bridge over the lake, the parked cars\nlook like specs, become smaller, the bridge\nitself becomes a thread.
On the ground flashes of light flicker.
In the next moment, a little above the glider, a\nwide thin belt of smoke, like a curtain unfolds.
'The Physics and Fireworks clubs collaborated to\nmake this. Use the movement of the smoke to find\nthe thermal.'
This is also Ageha's work.
'Thank you!'
The thin belt of smoke twirls in the wind and\nchanges shape.
Using this as a beacon finding a rising air\ncurrent is simple.
Above the lake the glider rises even higher.
'Hurry! Please, before it disappears! Make it in\ntime!'
'Please blow wind! Upwards! Please!'
I take the feelings we have felt all year, put\nthem into a voice and throw it at the God of\nWind.
'Amazing clouds, huh. So this is the Morning\nGlory...'
'Oh, there, Akari! The white thing!'
'It's tiny. Pass me the binoculars.'
'...It seems like it's not high enough... I\nwonder if they'll make it.'
'They'll be fine.'
'You sure?'
'It's Ageha and Aoi, isn't it?'
'Ever since way back, as long as they were\ntogether, there was nothing they couldn't do.'
'Fly into the sky! Higher!'
'Go!'
'Ah... Akari?'
'I was just trying to copy you. Or are you\nsuggesting my cheering is ineffective.'
'No, it's perfect!'
'...But in the end the most effective thing\nis...'
'Gah... This thermal is weak..!'
'Let's rotate! Find another...'
'We don't have time! C'mon, please climb!'
'...Aoi, Kotori, block your ears for a second!'
'Are you joking?!'
I hear a hissing noise.
'Go!'
The speaker shrills loudly.
I get assaulted by a sudden ringing headache.
Ageha's voice is loud, but everyone else, I can\nhear just as clearly.
'They're amazing... voices... Oohhh...!'
As if to answer everyone's prayers ...the\nthermal... provides the ascending air current\neveryone was waiting for.
'Aoi!'
'Yeah!'
We grab onto it with our new wings.
The glider reaches an even higher altitude.
We can do this..!
As the flight plan dictated, we make a large turn\nand take a bearing towards Mt. Tsukubae.
We only have one chance with the timing. But at\nthe moment I have no doubt that we will succeed.
Then finally.
Finally... It's come! It's Here!
'Yes! '
'Wow!'
Kotori and I are overcome with emotion, our eyes\nturn to the astounding view below us.
'What happened? Did you pass through?'
'Yeah. We just got to the Morning Glory! No\nproblems with the glider, flight is going\nsmoothly.'
When I transmit this over the radio I hear a\ncheer break out from everyone on the other end.
For a while we fly like this but...
'...So! Ageha I have a question!'
'What is it?'
'You said something before, when we were taking\noff. What did you say?'
'The words that you wanted to hear more than\nanything.'
'That's awful! That's unfair!'
'I won't be saying it again either!'
'I'll make you say it!'
'I'll think about it when you get back!'
'You promised to say it when I get back, right?\nIf you don't, I will punish you.'
'Oh really, do your best, I'll be waiting right\nhere for you, haha.'
'I've decided, I'll tickle you until you cry out\nan apology.'
'A punishing counter attack? But you know, I know\nyour weak point.'
'Y-you would bring that up at a time like this?!\nThat's not something you say in front of people!'
'Curse the fact that your body is weak in that\nspot!'
'Hey, you stupid love birds, I'm going to take\nthe controls, so feel free to continue your\nconversation.'
'But enough with the embarrassing talk. I'll pull\nus down otherwise'
'...Sorry'
'Sorry. I got carried away. It's my fault'
'You've always been like that, right?'
'Don't paint me with the same brush as you.'
'What? You're the lonely girl.'
'Unlike you I don't have any problems sleeping\nalone.'
'I'll never forget that incident with the teddy\nbear.'
'Ah jeez! Other people's dreams are being\nfulfilled right now. Pull yourselves together!'
